channel.title: Always error
channel.description:
when i go in a server(i go alot in www.schriel.nl)when i'm playing,i log out for no reason,and it says:error connecting to server
how comes?it happens alot,does it happen also to you?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2007, 12:18:06 PM[/size][hr]i'm waiting for 10mins,and i can't login yet :(
plz help
